post.body: Great, I'll copy the title and check it out. Thanks Stacy!
Well you just said that meds rarely solve more than 35% of attention problems, are you suggesting that meds would help?
yes, my son has a BIG attention problem. He can't stay focused.
Sorry, I have not read that Wiki you are talking about.
well, I'll ask my wife more on that. We agreed that meds are not an option for our son a few years back. I'll get more info..
reading Wikipedia will rot the mind. #TCOT
yes, back when he was about 5, and now the Dr. is not to sure. My son does have a ADHD like behavior.
I just started following you, so that hopefully I can get some tips with my 8 year old son. The Dr. thinks he is ADHD.
nope, I overcame that when I got married. Well so my wife tells me. ;-)
I had to go off line for a short to go pay bills. :-(
where you said, "can you believe the coverage on this? People are idiots who think Israel shouldn't defend herself (do not get me
and from an AP reporter too. It will be something if obama will support Israel (which I doubt he will), 100 days will tell.
LOL! My phone died last month, so right after church I was in the AT&T store! I'm trying to transfer 4 gigs of info to my new pho
